title.rendered: What is it and why do you need SEO in 2022?

content.rendered:
In this video, I answer the question of what is Search Engine Optimisation (SEO), but more importantly, we cover what SEO is not and why every business should be relying on SEO within their digital marketing campaigns this year.

You’ll soon have a good idea of all aspects on the Google search results page and understand exactly how SEO can be beneficial to growing your business.

To learn how to get more organic traffic to your website and rank it on Google throughout 2022, then make sure that you watch the second half of this video. Trying to rank your website on Google can be a mind field, but as a starting point, you can get your on-page SEO sorted and review the points raised in the training, you’ll soon know how to rank in Google and get more traffic to your website. figure out what is SEO in 2022, and improve your organic search position throughout the year.

If you would like to speak with an SEO specialist to see how your website’s search positioning can be better. Get in touch with an SEO expert today.
